ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Gangon woke up, and slowly followed BrightBlade, also slowly falling behind, for his wounds were a bit much........he transformed to beast mode and moved alot

Gangon woke up, and slowly followed BrightBlade, also slowly falling behind,
for his wounds were a bit much........he transformed to beast mode and moved
alot faster.....his scorpion tail dragging behind him, half cut off.......
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 06, 2000 4:00 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> BrightBlade, Rage
>
> * BrightBlade snarled in anger as Teltoli had run off, how dare that
Maximal
> fun from battle!
> She stomped her foot and threw her fist into the boulder, this was not
fair!
> She wanted to attack the Maximal and even perhaps bring the head of her
> catch back to Hell Beast, what a trophy that would make!
> BrightBlade growled as she drew her fist back from the rock, her knuckles
a
> little split and bleeding.
> She walked over to Gangon and shook his shoulder...*
>
> " Hay! Wake up!"
>
> * She had heard the command from Rampage to fall back and she thought it
> wise to do so, but she was so proud that they had won anyway!
> BrightBlade shook her partner's shoulder again, it was now time to go back
> for repairs.*
>
> ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
>
> * Rage watched as Scourge began to run towards the Predacon base, was she
> requested to follow?
> His words were now understandable but they were still a little hard to
> grasp, but she now felt shaken and vulnerable in this new form. She didn't
> want to be left alone, not like this!
> Rage then began to follow Scourge towards the Pred base, at least she then
> was with something that could help her understand this new body.*
>
